sys_script_include.name: BidValidationAjax

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9f84e6c4931b421094e3f15a7bba10a5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.BidValidationAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>BidValidationAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var BidValidationAjax = Class.create();
BidValidationAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    validateBid: function() {
        var bidAmount = parseFloat(this.getParameter('bid_amount'));
        var itemSysId = this.getParameter('sys_id');

        var bidValidator = new BidValidation();
        var result = bidValidator.validateBidAmount(bidAmount, itemSysId);

        return JSON.stringify(result);
    }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-05 05:51:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>9f84e6c4931b421094e3f15a7bba10a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BidValidationAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9f84e6c4931b421094e3f15a7bba10a5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-05 05:51:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
